$XRP
SWIFT and Ripple have a significant overlap in their banking partnerships, with more than 30 banks utilizing Ripple's technology, particularly its XRP Ledger, as a faster alternative to traditional SWIFT transfers. ¬π

Some notable banks using Ripple's technology include:
- *SBI Remit (Japan)*: Using Ripple Payments since 2017
- *CIBC (Canada)*: Utilizing ODL for real-time cross-border transactions
- *UnionBank (Philippines)*: Integrated RippleNet and ODL for cross-border payments
- *Axis Bank (India)*: Launched Ripple-powered international payments in 2017
- *Zand Bank (UAE)*: Using Ripple Payments for cross-border transfers

Ripple's partnership with Thunes has also connected XRP to SWIFT's network of 11,000 banks, enhancing global access to XRP liquidity.

$XRP  ETF Hits $1  Billion Milestone, Outpacing Bitcoin and Ethereum   üìà Since launching in November, the US Spot $XRP  ETF has crossed a major milestone with over $1  billion in net inflows, signaling growing institutional interest in altcoins.   While Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs saw significant outflows amid macroeconomic uncertainties, XRP's surge highlights a shift toward regulatory-clear assets.  XRP's price sits at $1 .90, with a market cap of $114.97 billion, despite recent declines.   The success of XRP ETFs could pave the way for more diversified investment options, pulling focus away from Bitcoin and Ethereum in favor of altcoins with clearer regulatory paths.  #Altcoin Season#  #Ripple  #XRP

$XRP
JPMorgan (JM) has announced a partnership with Ripple to accept XRP for mortgage and credit card payments, marking a significant shift in the adoption of digital currencies in traditional finance. This move is expected to enhance payment efficiency, reduce costs, and increase consumer flexibility. ¬π ¬≤

Key aspects of the partnership include:
- *Account Integration*: Clients will connect their JPMorgan accounts to their XRP wallets.
- *Payment Initiation*: Customers will choose XRP as their payment method.
- *Transaction Execution*: Payments will be handled instantly, deducting XRP from the client's wallet and crediting their JPMorgan account.

This partnership is part of JPMorgan's broader strategy to integrate digital currencies into its services, following its launch of blockchain-based Euro payments in June 2023. The bank's acceptance of XRP is seen as a validation of its legitimacy as a collateral asset.

$XRP   Is Quietly Positioning For Something Big üöÄ  Most people only talk about $XRP   when it pumps or dumps. But the real story right now isn‚Äôt the day-to-day price swings ‚Äî it‚Äôs the foundation that‚Äôs being built under the asset.  Regulatory uncertainty has been the biggest drag on $XRP   for years. That‚Äôs changing. A key U.S. court already confirmed XRP isn‚Äôt a security for retail trades, which opened the door for cleaner institutional participation. That‚Äôs a huge psychological and legal pivot for investors who were on the sidelines.  Beyond that, XRP isn‚Äôt just talking tech ‚Äî it‚Äôs being used. Cross-border payment integrations and real partnerships are expanding its utility outside pure speculation.  Meanwhile macro volatility keeps dragging crypto prices around, but XRP continues to hold interest from whales and institutions even in sideways markets. You‚Äôve got regulatory clarity trending in the right direction, growing real-world use cases, and institutional mechanisms forming behind the scenes. That trifecta doesn‚Äôt happen by accident.  Major question for the XRP Army: With legal overhang fading and real adoption picking up, are we finally past the ‚Äúcrypto speculation token‚Äù phase and entering the institutional utility token phase for XRP?

Science and Technology Daily: Beware of Criminals Buying Digital Yuan Wallets to Commit Fraud.  Beware These Fraud Traps.‚Äù* Liu Xiaochun, Director of the Shanghai Financial Digitalization Center, revealed that some criminals use instant messaging tools and other channels to spread info about buying digital currency wallets with promises of high returns. They then use the acquired wallets to carry out telecom fraud, money laundering, and other illegal activities. Other scammers create fake event pages to steal personal information and funds. $XRP
Evernorth, a Ripple-backed company, is planning to list on NASDAQ under the ticker XRPN through a merger with Armada Acquisition Corp II, a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC). This move aims to raise over $1 billion to create the largest publicly traded XRP treasury, with funds primarily used to purchase XRP on the open market. ¬π ¬≤ ¬≥

The listing is expected to close in Q1 2026, pending shareholder and regulatory approval. Evernorth's strategy involves actively managing XRP holdings through lending, DeFi, and liquidity strategies, differentiating itself from passive crypto funds.

Key backers include SBI Holdings ($200 million), Ripple, Pantera Capital, Kraken, and GSR. Ripple executives Brad Garlinghouse, Stuart Alderoty, and David Schwartz will serve as strategic advisors.

$XRP XRP stands apart because it was built as infrastructure, not ideology. While much of crypto seeks to replace the financial system, XRP aims to optimize it‚Äîsolving real problems like slow settlements, trapped liquidity, and high cross-border costs. These are not edge cases; they are structural inefficiencies measured in trillions of dollars.


Its strength lies in alignment with institutions, regulation, and incentives. As finance moves toward real-time settlement and interoperability, systems that reduce friction naturally win. XRP doesn‚Äôt need hype or mass consumer belief‚Äîit needs adoption by those who move value at scale.


If global finance evolves toward efficiency, XRP‚Äôs role isn‚Äôt speculative. It‚Äôs inevitable.

This one feels way quieter than it should üëÄ  $XRP  ETFs staying green day after day since launch isn‚Äôt exactly headline material ‚Äî especially when weekly inflows slow down. But that‚Äôs kind of the point. Consistency > excitement.  When flows cool but don‚Äôt reverse, it usually means positioning is still happening‚Ä¶ just without the crowd watching. That‚Äôs where structure starts to matter more than candles.  Same mindset I use when new tokens hit the market. Everyone obsesses over first-hour price action, but if the **listing mechanics are sloppy**, nothing else really holds. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôve been paying attention to how BingX handles listings lately ‚Äî cleaner structure, clearer pricing, less chaos early on.  Hype burns fast. Good setup gives price room to breathe.  I always ask one thing before trading anything new: does the foundation support real participation, or just a loud open?  Curious what you check first üëá #XRP  #AltcoinSeason  #BTC Price Analysis#  #BNBChain#
